title: When we will be viable to buy SKT T1 skins again? (Jhin,Zac,Syndra,Olaf,Nami)
body: I miss these skins and wonder how long i have to wait to buy then again?

replies.body: I'm sorry you missed them this most recent time, but typically those SKT skins do come back around during Worlds and you always have a chance of getting legacy skins from Hextech Chests!
